name: Carrot Boi - Demo
description:
Hey all! This is the unfinished product of my first game ever! It's not much of a game, all the character can do is move left and right. When will I be releasing an actually playable version? I plan on working on it after the game jam this is for ends.  

Important Note: To move the character press the A or D key. 

This is a submission for My First Game Jam 2022.
